title.rendered: Maximize the Value of Your Business with Michael Sirpilla of Encap33.com Part 2

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 25:23 — 23.2MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 25:23 — 23.2MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

We are still with Michael Sirpilla is the co-founder of Encap33 an FBA Aggregator and Private Equity firm. We’ll be talking about deal structures. The traditional deal structures you can get from aggregators through a broker and the sort of thing that the private equity company that Michael works for at Encap33.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • The thought process that you should list with a business broker
  • How to understand the individuals and what they will bring to the business
  • The differences between M & A advisor, Aggregator and PE
  • To prepare for future exit even if you’re not looking to exit yet
  • To make sure you have financials in order
